lemmaPos: definite article, demonstrative pronoun, relative pronoun
definitions: dative plural of 'der', 'die', 'das' (the ones, to whom, to which)
dative plural of 'dieser', 'diese', 'dieses' (these ones, to these)
dative plural of 'welcher', 'welche', 'welches' (which ones, to which)
examples: Die Kinder, denen ich das Buch gab.
Das sind die Leute, denen wir helfen.
Die Probleme, denen wir uns stellen.
